DOC.brief_summary: The investigators purpose is to offer active Transcranial Direct Current Stimulation (tDCS) in patients of the investigators previous study who received either placebo or sertraline and have not responded.
DOC.brief_title: Transcranial Direct Current Stimulation to Treat Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Patients from a previous study (ID:USPHU001) who: received sertraline and did not respond. received placebo and did not respond. Exclusion criteria: Patients from a previous study who: received active tDCS. responded.
